hours_text:
You are cordially invited to become a member of the Santa Barbara Historical Museum _Legacy Society_ by joining our circle of supporters who have made one or more of the special commitments listed below. By doing so, you help to provide a legacy of support for the preservation of history in Santa Barbara and beyond.

  * Naming the Museum as a beneficiary in your will
  * Including the Museum as beneficiary in a Charitable Remainder Trust
  * Including the Museum as beneficiary in a new or existing life insurance policy
  * Including the Museum in some other planned giving way  

* * *

For more information, please email membership@sbhistorical.org
admission_text:
# Membership

It is through the enthusiasm of people like you - people who understand that history expands horizons, teaches character, and inspires positive action - that the Museum is able to serve our community every day. Museum members provide critical support for operating expenses, and allows us to continue to tell the compelling story of Santa Barbara's past through engaging events, research and exhibitions.

To find out more about becoming a member, please contact:  
805.966.1601 ext. 110  
membership@sbhistorical.org

You can also join using the payment link below! Membership contributions are tax-deductible to the fullest extent of the law.

Membership Opportunities  
---  
Individual $50.00 USDSupporter $75.00 USDSustainer $125.00 USDSponsor $250.00 USDHistorian $500.00 USDPatron $1,000.00 USDDirector's Circle $2,500.00 USDPresident's Circle $5,000.00 USDStudent $25.00 USD  

* * *

## Subscribe
collections_text:
**We love Santa Barbara History and want to share it with you.**  
Experience the history of America's Riviera from our earliest residents, the Chumash,  
to the Silent Film Era, to the founding of Fiesta, and everything in between!

**Open Wednesdays-Sunday from noon-5pm**  
**Thursdays, noon-7pm  
Admission is free!**

### [EXHIBITIONS](http://web.archive.org/web/20260110225200/https://www.sbhistorical.org/exhibitions/)

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260110225200/https://www.sbhistorical.org/exhibitions/)

**Our latest exhibitions** _The Gift: New Additions to our Story and Ludmilla Pilat Welch: Serene Santa Barbara._

Quintessential **Santa Barbara**. Celebrate your special occasion at this cultural landmark located in the heart the historic district. Find out why we are voted **#1 Wedding Venue** year after year!
